Replaces fossil fuels.","start_date":"May 2021","description":"Welding / Brazing of Copper wires is an important process in electrical manufacturing industry. Copper with Copper or with some other metal is joined / fused for making an electrical connection.Conventionally fossil fuels like Acetylene or LPG with Oxygen are used as fuel. Mixture of Hydrogen + Oxygen generated from water using electrolysis, has proven to be superior fuel than fossil fuels. The supply chain and storage challenges are completely eliminated as the Hydroxy fuel is generated on-demand.Under AquaWelder project we undertake design, development , prototyping and manufacturing of machines for joining variety of metals like copper, mild steel, Brass,, stainless steel using brazing process.
